# HUD::SET_FAKE_MINIMAP_MAX_ALTIMETER_HEIGHT

## Summary
Sets a fake max height for the minimap altimeter

## Parameters
* **FLOAT** maxHeight
* **BOOL** colourAltimeterArea = false: Set this to TRUE to fill the altimeter background with a semi-opaque colour
* **HUD_COLOURS** hudColor = 21

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Argument must be 0.0f or above 38.0f, or it will be ignored.
